name: react-splitter-layout
description: A simple split layout for React and modern browsers
author: Yang Liu <hi@zesik.com>

scripts.coverage: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --include 'src/**/*.js*' --report lcov node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-register --reporter spec --require ignore-styles test/*.spec.js*
scripts.travis-coverage: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --include 'src/**/*.js*' --report lcovonly node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-register --reporter spec --require ignore-styles test/*.spec.js* && cat coverage/lcov.info | node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf coverage
